/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, teeming with life and activity. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the urban landscape. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades painted in a palette of mostly gray and white, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and yellow. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the man-made structures below.

Vehicles of various types are scattered across the street, including cars, buses, and motorcycles, each contributing to the dynamic energy of the scene. Pedestrians can be seen as well, going about their day, adding a human element to the urban landscape.

The image is taken from a low angle, which lends a sense of grandeur to the buildings and gives the viewer a sense of being part of the scene.
